question: Match the following terms with their correct descriptions based on the NCERT paragraph:
column_II: How it can be avoided is presented
Vital process without which species cannot survive
The story of life on earth
Continue to live through millions of years
Subjects used to explain reproductive processes
matches: Biology–The story of life on earth
Species–Continue to live through millions of years
Natural or anthropogenic extinction–Threats to long-term species survival
Reproduction–Vital process without which species cannot survive
Sexual reproduction–Enables creation of new variants
Flowering plants and humans–Subjects used to explain reproductive processes
Representative examples–Easy to relate for understanding
Human reproductive health–How it can be avoided is presented
Reproductive ill health–Related perspective to complete understanding
answer: Biology–The story of life on earth, Individual organisms–Die without fail, Species–Continue to live through millions of years, Natural or anthropogenic extinction–Threats to long-term species survival, Reproduction–Vital process without which species cannot survive, Progeny–Left by each individual, Sexual reproduction–Enables creation of new variants, Variants–Enhance survival advantage, Flowering plants and humans–Subjects used to explain reproductive processes, Representative examples–Easy to relate for understanding, Human reproductive health–How it can be avoided is presented, Reproductive ill health–Related perspective to complete understanding
